name: Vicious Debilitations
summary: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.
description: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike. Debilitation The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage. Debilitation The target becomes clumsy 1.
